name: Opacity: Genesis
description:
Opacity: Genesis is a space adventure horror game, with the elements of suspense, little action, story and monster. When the oxygen is depleted, the captain of the ship, who is stranded in space, lands on the mysterious space station, where he finds different unusual object. Most of all, he is intrigued by the "Crystal" found inside the station. 

Your mission is to get the oxygen tank and get out of the planet. 

Will you survive or will you die? Choice is yours. 

This is my 10th project and 3rd Solo game. I am very excited for this release and I hope you enjoy the experience. I want to thank my friends and supporters for keeping me motivated and I deeply appreciate everyone's kindness. Thanks so much, for visiting my page and downloading the game, it means a lot. Especially, considering the fact that, this might be my last game using the BGE, because no one uses it and I need to learn other engine for improving the quality of my future games. 

Please, feel free to comment, it helps me a lot. If the game has anything, like bugs or glitches. Also, any recommendations would be nice, especially critique. 

Thanks again. Visit my YouTube for updates and also, this game is prequel to my older game Opacity, so, you might want to check it out, if you are curious about the story. Have an amazing experience.
